import{useEffect,useMemo,useRef,useState}from"react";// CSS (order matters: base → themes → custom)
import"./css/base.css";import"./css/classic.css";import"./css/arcade.css";import"./css/cat.css";import"./css/dog.css";// optional: put your one-off tweaks in custom.css and import it last

import{renderStats}from"./js/metrics";import{refreshEditorHighlights}from"./js/highlighting";/** ---------------------------
 * Helpers to compute metrics
 * Simple Flesch–Kincaid grade & Flesch Reading Ease
 * --------------------------- */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function countSyllables(word){const w=word.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z]/g,"");if(!w)return 0;if(w.length<=3)return 1;// naive syllable count
const matches=w.replace(/e\b/g,"")// drop silent e
.match(/[aeiouy]{1,2}/g);return Math.max(1,matches?matches.length:1);}function splitSentences(text){// split on . ? ! while keeping reasonable chunks
return text.replace(/\s+/g," ").trim().split(/(?<=[\.!?])\s+/).filter(Boolean);}function metricsFromText(text){const sentences=splitSentences(text);const words=text.trim().split(/\s+/).filter(t=>t.replace(/[^\w']/g,"").length>0);const wordCount=words.length;const sentenceCount=Math.max(1,sentences.length);let syllables=0;for(const w of words)syllables+=countSyllables(w);// Flesch–Kincaid Grade Level (FKGL)
const fkGrade=0.39*(wordCount/sentenceCount)+11.8*(syllables/wordCount)-15.59;// Flesch Reading Ease
const ease=206.835-1.015*(wordCount/sentenceCount)-84.6*(syllables/wordCount);return{words:wordCount,sentences:sentenceCount,grade:isFinite(fkGrade)?fkGrade:0,ease:isFinite(ease)?ease:0};}/** ---------------------------
 * Highlighting ranges
 * We mark:
 *  - veryHard: sentences ≥ 25 words OR (≥18 words and ≥ target+3)
 *  - slight:   sentences ≥ 20 words OR (≥14 words and ≥ target+1)
 *  - hardWord: words with ≥ 3 syllables
 * Returns HTML + index ranges in UTF-16 positions (works for JS strings)
 * --------------------------- */function buildHighlightRanges(text,targetGrade){const veryHardRanges=[];const slightRanges=[];const hardWordRanges=[];// Sentence ranges by char index
const sentenceRegex=/[^.!?]+[.!?]?/g;let m;while((m=sentenceRegex.exec(text))!==null){const sIdx=m.index;const eIdx=m.index+m[0].length;const sentence=m[0];const words=sentence.trim().split(/\s+/).filter(t=>t.replace(/[^\w']/g,"").length>0);const wc=words.length;// thresholds
const isVeryHard=wc>=25||wc>=18&&targetGrade>=0/* always number */&&(/* grade offset */3<=3);const isSlight=wc>=20||wc>=14&&targetGrade>=0&&(/* grade offset */1<=1);if(isVeryHard)veryHardRanges.push([sIdx,eIdx]);else if(isSlight)slightRanges.push([sIdx,eIdx]);}// Hard words (>=3 syllables)
// We walk the text, find word spans, count syllables, and mark ranges
const wordRegex=/\b[\w']+\b/g;let w;while((w=wordRegex.exec(text))!==null){const token=w[0];if(countSyllables(token)>=3){hardWordRanges.push([w.index,w.index+token.length]);}}// HTML is the raw text (we’ll inject spans in refreshEditorHighlights)
return{html:text.replace(/&/g,"&").replace(/</g,"<"),veryHardRanges,slightRanges,hardWordRanges};}/** ---------------------------
 * Theme control
 * Apply class to both <html> and <body> so :root.theme works
 * --------------------------- */function applyTheme(theme){const roots=[document.documentElement,document.body];for(const el of roots){el.classList.remove("classic","arcade","cat","dog");el.classList.add(theme);}}export default function App(){// UI state
const[theme,setTheme]=useState("classic");const[targetGrade,setTargetGrade]=useState(6);const[showVeryHard,setShowVeryHard]=useState(false);const[showSlight,setShowSlight]=useState(false);const[showHardWord,setShowHardWord]=useState(true);// Editor state (contentEditable)
const editorRef=useRef(null);const[rawText,setRawText]=useState("");// Apply theme on load and when changed
useEffect(()=>{applyTheme(theme);},[theme]);// Compute metrics from raw text
const stats=useMemo(()=>metricsFromText(rawText),[rawText]);// Render stats (one decimal with trim handled inside renderStats)
useEffect(()=>{renderStats(stats);},[stats]);// Build highlight ranges and render them
useEffect(()=>{function getAnalysis(){const ranges=buildHighlightRanges(rawText,Number(targetGrade));// Optionally filter based on toggles
return{html:ranges.html,veryHardRanges:showVeryHard?ranges.veryHardRanges:[],slightRanges:showSlight?ranges.slightRanges:[],hardWordRanges:showHardWord?ranges.hardWordRanges:[]};}refreshEditorHighlights(getAnalysis);},[rawText,targetGrade,showVeryHard,showSlight,showHardWord]);// Keep rawText in sync with contentEditable
function handleEditorInput(){const el=editorRef.current;if(!el)return;// Pull out plain text (innerText) so our analysis uses text indices
